comment._content: Shows the Imperial Hotel in background.

comment.author: 72229014@N00
comment._content: I wonder if it is the Imperial hotel in Calgary? Not sure about the elevation of the land but Dawson was in Calgary in 1911 and the building in the postcard looks very similar if you look at the triangular type piece at the top plus the three floors with verandas. cdm280501.cdmhost.com/cdm/singleitem/collection/p280501co...
